fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Target one player; kill anybody who visits them or their neighbors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Ring of fire**
*Unlock Condition*: Kill three players
- You will now burn your target, roleblocking them and setting their defense to fragile.
- Upon getting seven kills, you now attack their target and their alive neighbors. You skip monkeys.
**Maelstrom**
*Unlock Condition*: Kill a player you used your ability on that night.
- You will now deal a basic attack to the player you used your ability on and their two alive neighbors in both directions.
- Upon getting 7 kills, you now deal a powerful attack.
- You skip over monkeys.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- You may only choose one upgrade, outlined in bold.
- Redirection immunity
- Roleblock immunity
- If you ever stay home, it will be treated as visiting yourself.
- You may never kill yourself.
